ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Sparling,Jerry Grandenetti,Jack Sparling,José Delbo,Sid Greene
ComicInfo.Summary:
Bernard thinks Mike stole his promotion so he drives him out in the country and pushes him off a cliff. Mike's ghost gets revenge.
A mysterious slave is taken from Africa to the United States where his owners continue to mysteriously disappear.
A ghostly policeman walks a beat in the cemetery.
A handsome prince turns into a frog.
ComicInfo.Title: The Trip of Fools!; The Beat Goes On!; Once Upon a Surprise Ending!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
